solution_line_template: Each of Samara's friends saw an average of {avg_alligators_per_friend} alligators each, a total of {num_friends}*{avg_alligators_per_friend} = <<{num_friends}*{avg_alligators_per_friend}={friends_total_alligators}>>{friends_total_alligators} alligators.
Together, Samara and her friends saw {friends_total_alligators}+{samara_alligators} = <<{friends_total_alligators}+{samara_alligators}={total_alligators}>>{total_alligators} alligators.
